Description_lang: Your melee attacks and abilities have a chance to viciously brand your target, dealing ${$s1*((1+$s3/100)^(1-$s5))} Fire damage over 6 sec, and grant you $@spellname425153, stacking up to 15 times. Damage increased per stack to a maximum of ${$s1*((1+$s3/100)^($s2-$s5))}.While above 5 stacks, also deals $s4% of its damage to you. At 15 stacks, enemies near your target suffer $s6% of the damage dealt split between them. $@spellname425153 decays every $425153t2 sec while out of combat and fades entirely after $s8 sec.
